synopsis.text:
Countess-led mutants, terrifying winged assassins, and children with extraordinary abilities populate this suspenseful tale of mystery and magic, set in a world forever altered by an explosion at an archaeological excavation research facility in the Middle East. The sky, now a psychedelic mirror, and the malfunctioning electronic devices are just the beginning of the eerie apocalypse that society is struggling to survive.

At the heart of the story are Tatsuya and Kiyoko, siblings and children of the scientist responsible for the explosion known as Twin X. Ostracized by society and burdened with their mother's debt, they find themselves caught in the middle of a power struggle between two factions with supernatural powers, both claiming to fight for the betterment of society.

As Tatsuya discovers his own psychic powers, he and Kiyoko must navigate the dangerous world of espionage and uncover the truth behind Twin X. With stunning visuals and breakthrough character designs, this anime masterpiece of the new millennium is a must-watch for fans of suspenseful, addictive tales.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
